Coop tells Buzz that he wants to stay in Springfield to help the family. Harley and Phillip get a phone call about Zach's behavior, which he attributes to his father. Alex and Gus both visit Alex at the police station. Phillip sends orders out to stop Olivia at immigration and then gives Ruth the job of digging up some dirt on Harley Cooper. Alex offers to help Gus get Harley back, if that is what he really wants and tells Gus that Phillip's weak spot is Beth.
